item.title: Operation Smile-XI: 43 Child Laborers Rescued in Jogulamba Gadwal.
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal : Jogulamba Gadwal police, under Operation Smile-XI, conducted raids throughout January and rescued 43 child laborers, registering two cases in connection with child labor violations, according to District SP T. Srinivas Rao, IPS.
Speaking on the occasion, the SP stated that from January 1 to 31, extensive inspections were carried out in bike repair shops, grocery stores, hotels, dhabas, restaurants, industries, and agricultural fields. During these raids, 43 child laborers were identifi...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
